div.p: This element does not refer to women writing in non-textual media but refers to any non-textual component of the Orlando project such as images with captions. It could refer to an author portrait, a facsimile page; it could contain links to sound recordings or video files. Eventually this element will be available in every kind of document we create for the project, and could be useful when including images. There are no mandatory or optional attributes or sub-elements for this element.
